text: Phir kaho “kya main un logon ki nishandahi karoon jinka anjaam khuda ke haan fasiqon ke anjam se bhi badhtar hai? Woh jinpar khuda ne lanat ki, jinpar uska gazab toota, jinmein se bandar aur suwar banaye gaye, jinhon ne taghut ki bandagi ki unka darja aur bhi zyada bura hai aur woh sawa-e-sabeel (right path) se bahut zyada bhatke huye hain”
